get.description: Endpoint to search for Companies according to the provided Connect Search Criteria. To get the most relevant results, it is recommended to use a unique identifier such as `regNo` where available. If a unique identifier is not available, use a combination of the companies registered `postCode` and `name` for the next best hit rate.
Endpoint to get the autocomplete results while searching for company names

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of items to return per Page (max 1000)

get.description: Endpoint to search for Directors according to the provided Connect Search Criteria.

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: Number of items to return per Page (max 200)

countries.name: countries
countries.description: Comma separated ISO 3166-1 two letter country codes

id.name: id
id.description: connectId - The primary Company identifier that is used to uniquely identify all companies across Creditsafes Universe and Partner Network. This is returned on all Company Search Results. Use this field to use in other operations such as Ordering Company Credit Report by Id, and Adding Company to Monitoring Portfolio.

safeNo.name: safeNo
safeNo.description: Safe Number - Identifier for Companies in Creditsafe's Home Countries.

regNo.name: regNo
regNo.description: Local Company Identifier - The Company identifier associated with it's Domestic Filing Agency. i.e. French SIREN/SIRET, United Kingdom Companies House CRN.

tradeName.name: tradeName
tradeName.description: Trade Name of the Company, typically used in Countries where Name is not uniquely registered.

acronym.name: acronym
acronym.description: A (non-unique) identifier to look for Companies by their more commonly known acronym rather than their lesser known full name. Acronym is predominantly available on French Companies.

exact.name: exact
exact.description: Provide as true to find Companies matching a Name exactly.

groupResults.name: groupResults
groupResults.description: Provide as true to group CA Companies that have same groupId

includePreviousName.name: includePreviousName
includePreviousName.description: Provide as true to include Companies that have changed their name in the past.

increaseRecall.name: increaseRecall
increaseRecall.description: Provide as true to include full page of Companies even if there are 50 matches and better scoring matches.

isGGS.name: isGGS
isGGS.description: Allows for USP internal search criteria to be bypassed under the assumption that the invoker has already performed the necessary checks.

street.name: street
street.description: Address part identifier - Street of the Company

houseNo.name: houseNo
houseNo.description: Address part identifier - House/Building Number of the Company

city.name: city
city.description: Address part identifier - City of the Company

postCode.name: postCode
postCode.description: Address part identifier - Postcode/Zip Code of the Company. Can be provided partially to extend to a region with a * as a wildcard. I.e. CF* can represent all postcodes starting with CF.

province.name: province
province.description: Address part identifier - Province/State of the Company

phoneNo.name: phoneNo
phoneNo.description: Provides Array of phone numbers or Null
